body_html: The current torch.transpose() works more like numpy.swapaxes(). We could rename the current transpose to swapaxes and slightly modify permute() behavior and make it a new transpose().
body_text: The current torch.transpose() works more like numpy.swapaxes().  We could rename the current transpose to swapaxes and slightly modify permute() behavior and make it a new transpose().
body: The current torch.transpose() works more like [numpy.swapaxes().](https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.swapaxes.html)  We could rename the current transpose to swapaxes and slightly modify permute() behavior and make it a new transpose().
